flies.name: Chubby Chernobyl

hook.description: Nymph and Streamer, Down eye, 3X long shank, 2X heavy wire, perfect bend, bronze

materialsList: UV Ice Dub (Yellow/Tan or Dark Olive

tyingNotes: Create wide channel for legs and wings

flies.name: Stimulator
flies.description: Great attractor fly. Immitates stonefly, caddis, and terrestrials.

hook.description: A straight-eye nymph and dry-fly hook that incorporates a gradually sloped bend to better imitate certain insects.

materialsList: XS or S Gold Ultra Wire
Brown Pro Grade Dry Fly Hackle (1 or 2 sizes smaller than the hook size)
Grizzly Pro Grade Dry Fly Hackle (1 or 2 sizes smaller than the hook size)

tyingNotes: Body should be dubbed fairly sparse.
Leave more room than you think for the head of the fly
Mark where to end the body dubbing about 3 or 4 eye lengths from the eye
When tying on the deer hair wing, hold firmly onto the deer hair until it has been tightened down to prevent spinning
